mapper.select: select fdURL from food where fdName = #{food_name}
select * from (select fdName from food order by fdIndex desc) where rownum < 201
select * from (select fdName from food order by fdPriceInd desc) where rownum <101
select * from (select fdName from food order by fdQualityInd desc) where rownum <101
select fdName from food order by fdSeasonInd desc sample(5)
